stripped_text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don't have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn a run on your mark ends, gain 2 credits if you breached that server during that run.
text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don ºt have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn a run on your mark ends, gain 2[credit] if you breached that server during that run.
title: Info Bounty
